DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine bioequivalence bioavailability four different Premarin/MPA test formulation versus current formulation Prempro .
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Four New Formulations Premarin Healthy Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy postmenopausal woman age 35 70 year 2 . Nonsmoker smoker le 10 cigarette per day 1 . History presence clot disorder 2 . History presence cancer 3 . Presence HIV , hepatitis B hepatitis C 4 . History drug alcohol abuse
